caption: It's a part of a movie. The theme of the movie is spy and agent. A man is having a wedding when something happens, and he finds it to be a dream. And then he opens a book, and he finds a video in it. He watches the video, itâ€™s about a network around the world and many people. He seems serious. After that, he destroys the video and meet with his friends. They go out at night. They meet with another group people and have a talk with them. Everything is still smooth now, with a car with its light on.
